sect1.title: Major Changes Between 4.0 and 5.0

sect2.title: Networking
sect2.itemizedlist:
Added ipv6 fast forward.
&man.fast_ipsec.4;: added support for IPsec NAT-T.
...

sect2.title: File systems
sect2.itemizedlist:
&man.mount.psshfs.8;: added &man.puffs.3; sshfs.
&man.refuse.3;: added FUSE compatibility functionality, layered on top of &man.puffs.3;.
Add read-only Apple HFS+ file system support.
&man.mount_9p.8; add support to mount a 9P file service with &man.puffs.3;.
...

listitem.para:
Hardware Monitors:
&man.aiboost.4;: ASUS AI Booster ACPI Hardware monitor driver.
&man.smsc.4;: Added support the for the hardware monitoring portion of the SMSC LPC47B397.
...

Miscellaneous:
&man.cmos.4;: driver for x86 CMOS RAM.
&man.eeprom.8;: Add the missing kernel bits on arm and powerpc that kept eeprom from actually changing firmware settings.
&man.genfb.4;: Generic framebuffer console driver with PCI and SBus frontends.
Added support for hardware monitoring on Sun Ultra Enterprise 450.

Networking:
&man.btuart.4;,&man.btuartd.4;: added support for Bluetooth HCI UART (H4) driver.
&man.tcp.4;: added per socket keepalive timer settings and the ability to change connection timeout.
...

USB:
&man.uslsa.4; added CP210x USB-RS232 ucom driver.
&man.zyd.4; added ZyDAS ZD1211/ZD1211B USB IEEE 802.11b/g wireless network device.
...

sect2.title: Platforms
sect2.itemizedlist:
i386:
Added support for Microsoft Xbox.
Added an opencrypto provider for VIA ACE (AES encryption instructions).
...
x86 (i386, amd64):
Intel(R) On Demand Clock Modulation driver, to save power and overheating in CPUs supporting the Thermal Monitor feature (TM).
...
evbppc: added support for Xilinx Virtex II-Pro/4-FX.
macppc: added support for four more Nubus video cards, including the VillageTronic MacPicasso 340.
ixp425: added support for NPE Ethernet.
zaurus: added support for Sharp C3x00 PDA.
evbmips: Add Infineon ADM5120 port.
sgimips: Added support for SGI O2 PS/2 controller &man.macekbc.4; and onboard display adapter &man.crmfb.4;, and imported &man.mavb.4; audio driver.
prep: Added support for the MTX604 RAVEN based machine. Other RAVEN based machines are also likely to work now.
mac68k: Switched &man.sn.4; Ethernet to using MI SONIC driver.
...

sect2.title: Kernel subsystems
sect2.itemizedlist:
Imported &man.drm.4; (Direct Rendering Manager).
Added support for POSIX Asynchronous I/O (aio).
Made the process scheduler modular allowing for different scheduling algorithms to be selected at runtime.
...
sect2.para: Kernel interfaces have continued to be refined, and more subsystems and device drivers are shared among the different ports. You can look for this trend to continue.

sect1.para: Besides this list, there have also been innumerable bug fixes and other miscellaneous enhancements of course.

sect2.title: Components removed from NetBSD
sect2.para: In this release of NetBSD, some software components known from previous releases were removed from the system. In some cases those were components that are not useful anymore or their utility does not justify maintenance overhead. Other components were not working properly and there was lack of interest in fixing them.
